intro: Myosotis foliosa, commonly known as the leafy forget-me-not, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It is characterized by its delicate blue or purple flowers and lance-shaped leaves. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests and rocky areas. It belongs to the Boraginaceae family and is known for its ornamental value. Myosotis foliosa is also valued for its ecological role in supporting native insect populations.
